page.title: 10Woodsetts and the Villagers
page.content: {Woodsetts}has changed because there used to be only the crossroads there and only a few{stone cottages.}Now the whole village has been built round the crossroads and many{new houses have been built of{brick.}A few of the old houses are still there.Most of the people in Victorian times worked on the land as farm workers.Now,people work in offices or factories in {Dinnington,Rotherham,Worksop}and {Sheffield}and travel by car.People now mostly work in towns.In Victorian times most people used to work in the country side.Most people in{Woodsetts own a{car.
